title: Why I'm rowing across the Pacific
description: Five years ago, Roz Savage quit her high-powered London job to become an ocean rower. She's crossed the Atlantic solo, and just started the third leg of a Pacific solo row, the first for a woman. Why does she do it? Hear her reasons, both deeply personal and urgently activist.
author: Roz Savage
keywords: TED, talks, adventure, entertainment, global issues, goal-setting, oceans
